content:
# The agent successfully moved back to the stone patch to gather more stone. 
# Now, I will proceed to harvest stone from the patch to collect enough resources for crafting the stone furnaces.

# Let's gather stone from the patch until I have at least 10 stones.
while current_inventory.get(Prototype.Stone, 0) < 10:
    gather_item(Prototype.Stone)  # Gather stone from the patch
    current_inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Update the inventory status
    print(f"Current inventory after gathering: {current_inventory}")

# Once I have enough stone, I will attempt to craft the stone furnaces again.
if current_inventory.get(Prototype.Stone, 0) >= 10:
    print("Sufficient stone collected for crafting furnaces.")
    craft_item(stone_furnace_prototype, quantity=2)
    print(f"Crafted 2 stone furnaces.")
else:
    print("Still not enough stone to craft stone furnaces.")
